Author: ChuislemoChroi
Text: I'm so sorry your family isn't being as supportive as they could or should be, and you're hurting as a result of that. You deserve so much better than to be made to feel like that!   Never forget that you are brave and powerful, and your decision to attempt recovery (especially after relapse!) only reaffirms that. You can do it, and you'll always have this community and many more to help you!
